title: "How can hypnosis be used to treat insomnia and pain in patients?"
first_phrase: This text is a part of a book on hypnosis and its use for therapeutic purposes. The last 200 tokens describe various techniques of hypnosis used for the treatment of insomnia and chronic pain. The text discusses the importance of suggestibility and the ability to induce a trance-like state in patients by using specific techniques, such as the use of music and visual aids. The author, Erminio Di Pisa, is a renowned hypnotist who has been practicing hypnosis for many years. His focus is on using hypnosis as a therapeutic tool rather than for entertainment purposes. The text provides practical examples of how to induce a hypnotic state and suggests that the success of hypnosis therapy depends on the skill and personality of the hypnotist.
